subject: Re: [junit] JUnit ANT Target
msgSnippet: OK Stefan. Thanks for all the help. -Harshal ... -- http://shahharshal.blogspot.com/ [Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
messageBody:
OK Stefan. Thanks for all the help.

-Harshal

On 5/11/06, Stefan Bodewig <stefan.bodewig@...> wrote:
>
> On Wed, 10 May 2006, Harshal Shah <shahharshal@...> wrote:
>
> > Can you please let me know how to throw plain formatter ?
>
> Sorry, that has been sloppy language. I wanted to suggest that you
> add a formatter of type plain to your junit task, see
> http://ant.apache.org/manual/OptionalTasks/junit.html
>
> Stefan
>
